overview:
As freelance journalist and copywriter Jesper Elm Larsen has specialised in writing for web, e-learning and film. He writes in both Danish and English.

Since 1992 Jesper Elm Larsen has run his own company - JEL Kommunikation - freelancing for leading advertising, e-learning and web agencies in Denmark. He has also worked together with some of Denmarkâ€™s major companies and is used to take the responsibility for directing the creative work from strategy to creative execution.
